creator: Slice Solutions, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the Slice Owners App, the app for pizzeria owners that partner with Slice. With online ordering built for pizza and loyalty marketing that constantly promotes your shop, Slice makes it easy for you to get online and your customers to order more pizza, more often.

The Slice Owners App gives you 24/7 access to track your performance, conveniently on your device. Here you can:

- View your digital order summary
- View order history & export order receipts
- View & export your statements
- Temporarily close and re-open your shop
- Quickly switch between your shop locations
- View your regular opening hours
- View & edit your menu
- Upload photos for menu items
- Chat to our team directly from the app

If you have any questions or need help logging in, please contact your Account Manager, email partner@slicelife.com, or call (855) 237-4992
descriptionShort: The app for pizzeria owners. Manage your shop and view performance on Slice

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New! Shop Insights uses your data to give you actionable business tips. Plus, we’ve enhanced your sales report, added an at a glance performance graph, and relocated the location toggle to the very top of the app.
